about.description: LTTL is an open-source python package for text processing and analysis. LTTL consists of (i) a set of classes for representing segmental analyses of text strings (= “segmentations”), whereby portions of text strings are delineated and possibly annotated with specific labels; (ii) a set of classes for creating and manipulating segmentations, in order to produce either modified version of the original text data, or data tables summarizing properties of these data (e.g. unit frequency, complexity measures, concordances, and so on). LTTL was designed and implemented by LangTech Sarl.
about.summary: LangTech Text Library (LTTL) for text processing and analysis

about.description: LTTL is an open-source python package for text processing and analysis. LTTL consists of (i) a set of classes for representing segmental analyses of text strings (= “segmentations”), whereby portions of text strings are delineated and possibly annotated with specific labels; (ii) a set of classes for creating and manipulating segmentations, in order to produce either modified version of the original text data, or data tables summarizing properties of these data (e.g. unit frequency, complexity measures, concordances, and so on). LTTL was designed and implemented by LangTech Sarl.
about.summary: LangTech Text Library (LTTL) for text processing and analysis

name: lttl
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "LTTL" %}
{% set version = "2.0.12" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/LTTL-{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: 3450330cbc78e9dead81f5b8ffefc198f4857c568990c6e7a2118c27c812c3b9

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3.6
  run:
    - backports.functools_lru_cache
    - future
    - numpy
    - python >=3.6
    - scipy
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - LTTL
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://github.com/axanthos/LTTL
  summary: LangTech Text Library (LTTL) for text processing and analysis
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: LICENSE
  dev_url: https://github.com/axanthos/LTTL
  description: |
    LTTL is an open-source python package for text processing and analysis. LTTL consists of (i) a set of classes for representing segmental analyses of text strings (= “segmentations”), whereby portions of text strings are delineated and possibly annotated with specific labels; (ii) a set of classes for creating and manipulating segmentations, in order to produce either modified version of the original text data, or data tables summarizing properties of these data (e.g. unit frequency, complexity measures, concordances, and so on). LTTL was designed and implemented by LangTech Sarl.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - HeavyTony2
